statements: SELECT * FROM famous_actors;
SELECT actor_name, age FROM famous_actors;
SELECT actor_name, filmography FROM famous_actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM famous_actors WHERE actor_id = 3;
SELECT actor_name, age, filmography FROM famous_actors ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM famous_actors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, age FROM famous_actors WHERE filmography LIKE '%comedy%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT actor_name, age FROM famous_actors WHERE actor_name LIKE 'A%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT actor_id FROM famous_actors WHERE age < 30 AND filmography IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_actors FROM famous_actors WHERE filmography NOT LIKE '%drama%';
SELECT * FROM actors
SELECT actor_id, name, age FROM actors WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, filmography FROM actors ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT title, release_year, genre FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010
SELECT movie_id, title, genre FROM movies ORDER BY movie_id ASC
SELECT actor_id, name, age, filmography FROM actors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, release_year, genre, movie_id FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' OR genre = 'Adventure' ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT actor_id, name, age, filmography FROM actors WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT title, release_year, genre, movie_id FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2010 AND genre LIKE '%Comedy%' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT actor_id, name, age, filmography FROM actors JOIN movies ON actors.actor_id = movies.movie_id WHERE genre = 'Drama' ORDER BY release_year DESC, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM famous_actors;
SELECT name, age, filmography FROM famous_actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT name, title, role FROM famous_actors JOIN actor_movie_mapping ON famous_actors.actor_id = actor_movie_mapping.actor_id JOIN movies ON actor_movie_mapping.movie_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT * FROM famous_actors WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM famous_actors;
SELECT name, age FROM famous_actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT movie_id, title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_year >= 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT actor_id, name, filmography FROM famous_actors JOIN actor_movie_mapping ON famous_actors.actor_id = actor_movie_mapping.actor_id WHERE actor_movie_mapping.movie_id = 123;
SELECT actor_id, name, title, role FROM famous_actors JOIN actor_movie_mapping ON famous_actors.actor_id = actor_movie_mapping.actor_id JOIN movies ON actor_movie_mapping.movie_id = movies.movie_id;
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT name, age FROM actors ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT title, director, genre FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2015;
SELECT actor_id, filmography FROM actors WHERE age < 40;
SELECT movie_id, title, release_year, director FROM movies ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT actor_id, name, filmography FROM actors WHERE age < 40 AND filmography LIKE '%comedy%' ORDER BY actor_id DESC;

SELECT m.title, m.release_year, m.director, a.name AS actor_name FROM movies m JOIN actor_movie_relation amr ON m.movie_id = amr.movie_id JOIN actors a ON amr.actor_id = a.actor_id WHERE amr.role = 'lead actor' AND a.age between 25 and 35;
SELECT a.name AS actor_name, COUNT(amr.movie_id) AS num_movies FROM actors a JOIN actor_movie_relation amr ON a.actor_id = amr.actor_id GROUP BY a.name HAVING num_movies > 3 ORDER BY num_movies DESC;
SELECT a.name AS actor_name, aw.award_name, aw.year_received FROM actors a JOIN awards aw ON a.actor_id = aw.actor_id WHERE aw.year_received >= 2000 ORDER BY aw.year_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT filmography FROM actors WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT movies.title, actors.name, reviews.rating FROM movies JOIN roles ON movies.id = roles.movie_id JOIN actors ON roles.actor_id = actors.id JOIN reviews ON movies.id = reviews.movie_id WHERE reviews.rating > 8 ORDER BY movies.release_date ASC;
SELECT actors.name, COUNT(*) as total_awards FROM actors JOIN awards ON actors.id = awards.actor_id GROUP BY actors.name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_awards DESC;

SELECT movies.title, COUNT(*) as total_reviews, AVG(reviews.rating) as avg_rating FROM movies JOIN reviews ON movies.id = reviews.movie_id GROUP BY movies.title HAVING total_reviews > 5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;

SELECT actors.name, SUM(reviews.rating) as total_ratings FROM actors JOIN roles ON actors.id = roles.actor_id JOIN reviews ON roles.movie_id = reviews.movie_id GROUP BY actors.name ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
